Control Name: Implements Changes to Prevent and Detect Recurrences—Additional architecture or changes to preventive and detective controls, or both, are implemented to prevent and detect recurrences on a timely basis.

control_attributes.Control: Implements Changes to Prevent and Detect Recurrences—Additional architecture or changes to preventive and detective controls, or both, are implemented to prevent and detect recurrences on a timely basis.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.5 The entity identifies, develops, and implements activities to recover from identified security incidents.
